text: Herbert Ernest "Bert" Brocklesbury (27 June 1879 – 9 March 1959) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1879 births Category:1959 deaths Category:People from Grimsby Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Grimsby White Star F.C. players Category:St James United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Grimsby All Saints F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Bert Brocklesbury
